alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:32PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dona Ana County through 200 PM MDT... At 132 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Organ. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dona Ana, East Mesa, Portions of Jornada Experimental Range and Northeast Las Cruces. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in New Mexico near mile marker 1, and between mile markers 10 and 11. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 153 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
